content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I am happy to negotiate the rental price for my apartment. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 450 Euros. This is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 450 Euros is too low. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 500 euros? This is a reasonable price for an apartment of this size and location in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's better, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 550 euros? This is a good price for the apartment, considering its location and size.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's closer to what I am looking for, but I am still hoping for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about 600 euros? This is a good price for the apartment, considering its location and size.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's more like it. I agree to the price of 625 Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 625 Euros!
name: Haoyu Wang from China
